# structuredLocation

**Instance Property**

The location to trigger an alarm.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var structuredLocation: EKStructuredLocation? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is used in conjunction with [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/proximity] to perform geofence-based triggering of reminders.

## Setting GeoFence-based Alarms

- **EKAlarmProximity**: A value indicating whether an alarm is triggered by entering or exiting a region.
- **proximity**: A value indicating how a location-based alarm is triggered.
